abilities.name: Insatiable Hunger
abilities.description: Broodmother's hunger gives her a rush of blood lust, granting bonus attack damage and lifesteal.
abilities.notes: Provides damage and lifesteal for the duration.

abilities.name: Spin Web
abilities.description: Spins a large web that renders Broodmother invisible while allowing free movement and increased regeneration. An area of webbing persists on the ground, granting the same buffs to spiderlings.
abilities.notes: Provides invisibility while on the web unless attacking or using abilities. Grants free pathing on the web for Broodmother and her spiderlings.

abilities.name: Incapacitating Bite
abilities.description: Broodmother's venom cripples enemies with her attacks, slowing their movement speed and giving them a chance to miss their attacks.
abilities.notes: Applies a debuff that slows movement and gives enemies a chance to miss their attacks.

abilities.name: Spawn Spiderlings
abilities.description: Broodmother injects her victim with eggs which hatch into deadly spiderlings. When spiderlings attack enemies, there is a chance they will spawn even smaller spiderites.
abilities.notes: Kills from this spell spawn spiderlings. Spiderlings have a 20% chance to spawn a spiderite when attacking.

innate_abilities.name: Spider's Milk
innate_abilities.description: Grants a lifesteal-based heal over time buff per enemy hero killed within the radius.
innate_abilities.notes: Provides healing over time when enemy heroes are killed nearby.
